Package com.example.breadheadsinventorymanager

Class ItemListFilterer

java.lang.Object
com.example.breadheadsinventorymanager.ItemListFilterer
public class ItemListFilterer extends Object
Handles sorting and filtering logic of the item list in MainActivity. Most of the UI logic is done by ItemListUI, but this class contains some utilities for UI handling as well.
See Also:
  • ItemListUI

      public boolean toggleSortOrder()
      Changes the order items are sorted in.
      Returns:
      True if the new sort order is ascending, otherwise false
